## IEquiv interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IEquiv 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [equiv(o)](./api.iequiv.equiv.md) | Returns <code>true</code> if this \*value\* is equivalent to <code>o</code>. Also see <code>ICompare.compare</code> and <code>IHash.hash</code>. |
